page.title: 09A Purnell's worker,Paulton.
page.content: Mr B. is a printing engineer at {Purnell's}factory in{Paulton.}He has worked at the factory for 45 years.He works on 2 shifts,which last from 6.00pm to 1.30am and 1.30pm to 9.00pm. He has a 10 minute break on night shift,and a 30 minute break on day shift. { Purnells}employs 950 workers and covers 30 acres.There are large printing machines,most of which come from Germany.The heaviest machine in the factory weighs 300 tons.250 000 sheets of paper are printed every day.About 30 lorries enter and leave the factory every day.The large machines cost about Â£500 000 each. Magazines and books are printed.The 'Radio Times','Woman','Woman's own' and 'Woman and Home' are some of the titles printed at the factory.
